item.title: Flouting LTN cameras, 28th July
item.description:
Hi, the Enforcement Team must be aware of people who remove/obscure number plates to evade cameras. This person's a repeat offender, I noticed him again yesterday, Sunday 27 July, around 12:00. It's unacceptable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 28th July

item.title: Abandoned bike, 28th July
item.description:
Hi, this bike has been left here for over 8 months, it is chained to a lampost and is obstructing the road to the extent that you can't use the roadside next to it. It is dangerously abandoned.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: House shakes when large vehicles run over these pot holes., 28th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edison Road, East Wickham, London
